attributes.action: Nominate Mr Jeremy Clarkson for a Knighthood
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
Nomination required for Jeremy Clarkson because he makes us all laugh which is very rare these days. He also is a great down to earth guy who just tells it how it is, with no lies and no spin.
He deserves to be a Knight of the Realm as he is one of the great entertainers on TV today.

rejection.details: The Cabinet Office is actively seeking nominations for honours from the public. Please go to http://www.honours.gov.uk/
reasons: Issues for which an e-petition is not the appropriate channel
